titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning on October 13, 2019, as "National Wildlife Refuge Week".
A resolution designating the week beginning on October 13, 2019, as "National Wildlife Refuge Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
The resolution designates the week beginning on October 13, 2019, as National Wildlife Refuge Week.
The resolution also acknowledges the importance of national wildlife refuges for their recreational opportunities and contribution to local economies.
Finally, the resolution reaffirms the support of the Senate for wildlife conservation and the National Wildlife Refuge System.
